name: BROKEN SIGNAL
description:
BROKEN SIGNAL is my 7DRL (7 Day Roguelike Challenge) entry for 2020.

Jetpack & Overclock your way to the top of the radio tower and Break the Signal!

Unlock 3 difficulty levels, with increasingly tough towers to overcome.

Super explosive, super fast paced, super hard.

See if you can beat all 3 modes!

==========

Game Info & System Requirements

  • Supports Keyboard & Mouse or Xbox 360 Controller.
  • Currently requires a pretty powerful PC to run smoothly at high settings (eg: GeForce 970).
  • If running on a lower end machine, try running at 1280 x 720 on Low Quality settings, for example.  

==========

Broken Signal was created using an existing FPS project I had worked on in the past.  

For the 7DRL Challenge, I added the procedural level generation, and generally tweaked and improved lots of things!

I've been having heaps of fun playing it, and I hope you enjoy it too.

==========

Game Developed by Murray Lorden

You can follow me on Twitter @muzboz

==========

Voices by Brendan Barnett  @Human_Brendan

Music by My name is Gus  http://soundcloud.com/mynameisgus/

Game Logo by Tom Garden  @TomGarden45
